snippet: The Oklahoma Supreme Court refused to delay a grand jury investigation into the Tulsa sheriff’s office after a former volunteer deputy fatally shot an unarmed man in April.
abstract: Oklahoma Supreme Court refuses to delay grand jury investigation into Tulsa County sheriff's office after former volunteer deputy Robert Bates fatally shot unarmed and retrained man Eric Harris in April; Bates, close friend of Sheriff Stanley Glanz, faces manslaughter charges.
lead_paragraph: The Oklahoma Supreme Court refused to delay a grand jury investigation into the Tulsa sheriff’s office after a former volunteer deputy fatally shot an unarmed man in April.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Court Allows Inquiry Into Sheriff’s Office
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Court Allows Inquiry Into Sheriff’s Office
